remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service determines which Avatar System Code it will use by reading the contents of the ./AppData/Runtime/system.code file.
This file should contain a single line of text with one of the following values:
LIVE
UAT

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Avatar.SystemCode.GetSystemCode
member.summary: Get the Avatar System Code that the Tingen Web Service will use.
member.returns: The Avatar System Code the Tingen Web Service will use.

member.name: T:Outpost31.WelcomeToOutpost31
member.summary: A place for Outpost31 details and stuff.

remarks.para:
Outpost31 is the back-end logic for the Tingen web service.
This class is just a placeholder for documentation, and where the Outpost31 version number is
updated (see the header above).
While you're here, take a look at this stuff:
The Tingen Documentation
Uh...I guess that's it. Thanks for stopping by!
